centers.description: Amongst the well-established riding schools in Saudi Arabia, Riyadh is characterised by an ideal combination of well-trained horses / ponies, skilled instructors, and picturesque open fields. Known to provide friendly horse riding lessons to schools and families. We also organise pony trekking trips and arrange children’s’ pony parties.

Table tennis, also known as ping-pong, is a sport in which two or four players hit a lightweight ball back and forth across a table using small rackets. The game takes place on a hard table divided by a net. Except for the initial serve, the rules are generally as follows: players must allow a ball played toward them to bounce one time on their side of the table, and must return it so that it bounces on the opposite side at least once. A point is scored when a player fails to return the ball within the rules. Play is fast and demands quick reactions. Spinning the ball alters its trajectory and limits an opponent's options, giving the hitter a great advantage.
centers.comments: Good place for table tennis and other indoor stuff.

centers.description: Riyadh Golf Courses are located just 20 minutes from Riyadh, making it the perfect location for members, visitors, golfers, and non-golfers to enjoy a unique range of benefits and remarkable golfing facilities. RGC has a relaxing comfortable environment whether you are playing golf, having a bite to eat, or using our sports facilities. You can enjoy the golf course challenge, the practice facilities, sports garden and clubhouse. The excellent golf course and RGC’s many other superb facilities are an oasis in the Saudi Arabian desert so please explore the website, book a tee time or just come to visit our “Pearl in the Desert”.

Experience the astounding addictive fun with KSA’s first ever Electric Karts. These punchy little sophisticated Karts are just what ‘speedsters’ dreamt of What’s more, master the twists & turns of Kart racing in a fully air-conditioned arena. (Sounds cool?) Get behind the wheels for a fun filled day of excitement with your family. Fasten your seatbelts for the adrenaline rush. Get, Set, Doos!
centers.comments: Good place for  fun and other indoor stuff.

centers.description: Equally elegant and inviting, Strike Bowling Alley in Riyadh offers a family-friendly destination with a touch of luxury. The lounge-inspired setting features a billiards table, six bowling lanes and a 100-inch TV broadcasting major sporting events. The menu features American bar-inspired fare including waffle fries, nachos, beef sliders and sweet shakes; a juice bar features refreshing beverages for the entire family. Themed events are hosted throughout the year.
centers.comments: Good place for  fun and other indoor stuff.

centers.description: Jeddah Challenge Round Playspace are located just 20 minutes from Jeddah, making it the perfect location for members, visitors, gamers, and non-gamers to enjoy a unique range of benefits and remarkable gaming facilities. GR has a relaxing comfortable environment where you can enjoy playing. You can enjoy the golf course challenge, the practice facilities, sports garden and clubhouse. The excellent golf course and RGC’s many other superb facilities are an oasis in the Saudi Arabian desert so please explore the website, book a tee time or just come to visit our “Pearl in the Desert”.
